Two years ago today, the Senate passed a bill to fix our broken immigration system with a bipartisan majority. #ImmigrationAction
The bill would have put millions of people on a path to citizenship and grown the economy by a cumulative $1.2 trillion. #ImmigrationAction
Over the past two years, the House’s failure to take #ImmigrationAction has cost the country $26.8 billion.
The President is acting where he can, but we need Congress to pass a comprehensive solution to fix our broken system. #ImmigrationAction

DEAŞ terrorist organization to take Turkey in the same brackets, namertliktir is low.
In the last four years we have only had one compassion: Conscience.
In the last 5 months we have sent nearly two thousand human beings to Kobani. Today in Kobani, if the quarries are smoking, it is on the basis of Turkey's aid.
We are just and only pursuing the growth, building, raising, friendship and brotherhood.
Despite Turkey's sincere attitude, to pursue political profits through flowing innocent blood; humanity, conscience to take the feet.
We have never allowed anybody to operate through Turkey, and we will not tolerate those undertakings after that.
We will not even look into the efforts of the terrorist organizations to turn the chaos in the region.
The attitude that Turkey put in front of the Kobani, especially the armenians living in Syria and Iraq, showed no other country.
Those who still speak against the Turks in the name of international perception operations are doing the greatest immorality, the greatest underestimation.
We did not do anything we did for these bastards. Our aim is to ointment the wounds of our victims and oppressed brothers who live there.
Today, Economics, with the exception of several, have told us that they do not allow democracy to breathe. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
We will not ask for permission from either Mr Schaeble nor Mr Desselblum to give the floor to the Greek people. # Vouli #Greece
The #dimopsifisma for our people to decide for the future will be the next Sunday. #Greece #vouli
The expression of the will of the peoples by referendums is not new in Europe. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
Did anyone tell the French people when they decided on the European Constitution that this is not allowed? #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
Some people think the issue of Greece is a game. But the dignity of a people is not a toy. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
One and a half million unemployed are not a toy. The 3 million poor are not a toy. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
They suspect that threats, extortion, panic strikes will bend the will of a people to live with dignity.
Yesterday we were busting with liquidity today with the banks, with fear, panic, and scandal. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
The only thing that has to fear today, after so many years of pillaging the Greek people, is fear itself. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
@ miramar68 The mackerel was fried with cream and served with cucumber salad. Very good. Think your grandmother would be happy.
Sometimes terrorism when it gets so blatantly leads to exactly the opposite results. The world is catching up. #vouli #dimopsifisma
5 months ago, from the very first days of our election, we gave a tough and sincere battle for our people and our homeland. #vouli #dimopsifisma
Greece actually negotiated with its lenders. Resolute, methodical, dignified. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
At the critical time, with the persistence of the IMF, in particular, asked to subtract, moderate our proposals for wealth taxation #dimopsifisma
At the same time, they made it clear that they do not care about the extra income from the control of illegal wealth #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
They also asked us to move away from the European acquis of collective bargaining #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
They asked us to legislate for collective redundancies and employer lockout #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
They demanded VAT on tourism, ie hotels and restaurants, from 6.5% to 23% #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
They asked us not to agree but to deliver our political dignity. #Greece #you #dimopsifisma http://t.co/AfqlSEV2eU
They have asked us to attack, once again, employees and pensioners. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
They ask a lot of people. What will happen the next day? #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
Greece is & should remain euro area member. In contact with leaders to ensure integrity of euro area of 19 countries
The next day of a proud, not the negotiating capacity of our country will be much more strengthened. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
The moment they will understand that Greece is not going to be delivered. That is not a game that is over. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
Our decision to dominate the Greek people is not a decision to break with Europe. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
It is a decision to break with practices that affect Europe. With the practices of extortion and compulsion. # Dimopsifisma
I am sure the Greek people will send a message of democracy and dignity across Europe. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
A great yes to the government's decision to reject this ultimatum that offends the democratic tradition of Europe. # Dimopsifisma
These principles and values ​​we defend: Democracy Equality Solidarity Human dignity and social rights. #dimopsifisma
We commit ourselves that from Monday July 6, with the power of the popular verdict, we will continue our efforts. #vouli #dimopsifisma
Today Europe is in Greece. Looks at the dignity of the Greek people. #Greece #vouli #dimopsifisma
We have no right, with our own choice and our signature, to put the tombstone of the Republic in this place. #dimopsifisma
